messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Research question:
messages.msgSnippet: Her collection was sold by Sotheby s NY about 12-14 years ago, she has some very fine pieces. Alan ... From: klepet33319 To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent:
messages.messageBody:
Her collection was sold by Sotheby's NY about 12-14 years ago, she has some very fine pieces.
Alan
----- Original Message -----
From: klepet33319
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2006 3:59 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Research question:


By chance are any of the members of the board familiar with a
collector/scholar by the name of Ruth Schneidman? I am attempting to
cross reference some annotations and her name is mentioned in a copy of
the 'Toso Soran' by Torigoye. Thanks much as always!
Pete Klein
